verses.verse: הַאֲזִ֥ינוּ <S%H238><s%> Give ear הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> O ye heavens וַאֲדַבֵּ֑רָה <S%H1696><s%> and I will speak וְתִשְׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> and hear הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> O earth אִמְרֵי־ <S%H561><s%> the words פִֽי׃ <S%H6310><s%> of my mouth

יַעֲרֹ֤ף <S%H6201><s%> shall drop כַּמָּטָר֙ <S%H4306><s%> as the rain לִקְחִ֔י <S%H3948><s%> My doctrine תִּזַּ֥ל <S%H5140><s%> shall distil כַּטַּ֖ל <S%H2919><s%> as the dew אִמְרָתִ֑י <S%H565><s%> my speech כִּשְׂעִירִ֣ם <S%H8164><s%> as the small rain עֲלֵי־ <S%H5921><s%> on דֶ֔שֶׁא <S%H1877><s%> upon the tender herb וְכִרְבִיבִ֖ים <S%H7241><s%> and as the showers עֲלֵי־ <S%H5921><s%> on עֵֽשֶׂב׃ <S%H6212><s%> upon the grass

כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for שֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> the name יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶקְרָ֑א <S%H7121><s%> Because I will publish הָב֥וּ <S%H3051><s%> ascribe גֹ֖דֶל <S%H1433><s%> ye greatness לֵאלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> unto our God

הַצּוּר֙ <S%H6697><s%> [He is] the Rock תָּמִ֣ים <S%H8549><s%> [is] perfect פָּעֳל֔וֹ <S%H6467><s%> his work כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all דְּרָכָ֖יו <S%H1870><s%> for all his ways מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <S%H4941><s%> [are] judgment אֵ֤ל <S%H410><s%> a God אֱמוּנָה֙ <S%H530><s%> of truth וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> and without עָ֔וֶל <S%H5766><s%> and without iniquity צַדִּ֥יק <S%H6662><s%> just וְיָשָׁ֖ר <S%H3477><s%> and right הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> They

שִׁחֵ֥ת <S%H7843><s%> They have corrupted ל֛וֹ לֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> not בָּנָ֣יו <S%H1121><s%> [is] not [the spot] of his children מוּמָ֑ם <S%H3971><s%> themselves their spot דּ֥וֹר <S%H1755><s%> generation עִקֵּ֖שׁ <S%H6141><s%> [they are] a perverse וּפְתַלְתֹּֽל׃ <S%H6618><s%> and crooked

הֲ־ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לַיְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD תִּגְמְלוּ־ <S%H1580><s%> Do ye thus requite זֹ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise עַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> people נָבָ֖ל <S%H5036><s%> O foolish וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not חָכָ֑ם <S%H2450><s%> cunning הֲלוֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he אָבִ֣יךָ <S%H1><s%> fathers קָּנֶ֔ךָ <S%H7069><s%> [that] hath bought ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> He עָֽשְׂךָ֖ <S%H6213><s%> thee? hath he not made וַֽיְכֹנְנֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3559><s%> thee and established

זְכֹר֙ <S%H2142><s%> Remember יְמ֣וֹת <S%H3117><s%> the days עוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> of old בִּ֖ינוּ <S%H995><s%> consider שְׁנ֣וֹת <S%H8141><s%> the years דּוֹר־ <S%H1755><s%> of many וָד֑וֹר <S%H1755><s%> generations שְׁאַ֤ל <S%H7592><s%> ask אָבִ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1><s%> thy father וְיַגֵּ֔דְךָ <S%H5046><s%> and he will shew זְקֵנֶ֖יךָ <S%H2205><s%> thee thy elders וְיֹ֥אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> and they will tell לָֽךְ׃

בְּהַנְחֵ֤ל <S%H5157><s%> their inheritance עֶלְיוֹן֙ <S%H5945><s%> When the most High גּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> to the nations בְּהַפְרִיד֖וֹ <S%H6504><s%> when he separated בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the sons אָדָ֑ם <S%H120><s%> of Adam יַצֵּב֙ <S%H5324><s%> he set גְּבֻלֹ֣ת <S%H1367><s%> the bounds עַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> of the people לְמִסְפַּ֖ר <S%H4557><s%> according to the number בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for חֵ֥לֶק <S%H2506><s%> portion יְהֹוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> For the LORD'S עַמּ֑וֹ <S%H5971><s%> [is] his people יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob חֶ֥בֶל <S%H2256><s%> [is] the lot נַחֲלָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H5159><s%> of his inheritance

יִמְצָאֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H4672><s%> He found בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> land מִדְבָּ֔ר <S%H4057><s%> him in a desert וּבְתֹ֖הוּ <S%H8414><s%> and in the waste יְלֵ֣ל <S%H3214><s%> howling יְשִׁמֹ֑ן <S%H3452><s%> wilderness יְסֹֽבְבֶ֙נְהוּ֙ <S%H5437><s%> he led him about יְב֣וֹנְנֵ֔הוּ <S%H995><s%> he instructed יִצְּרֶ֖נְהוּ <S%H5341><s%> him he kept כְּאִישׁ֥וֹן <S%H380><s%> him as the apple עֵינֽוֹ׃ <S%H5869><s%> of his eye

כְּנֶ֙שֶׁר֙ <S%H5404><s%> As an eagle יָעִ֣יר <S%H5782><s%> stirreth up קִנּ֔וֹ <S%H7064><s%> her nest עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over גּוֹזָלָ֖יו <S%H1469><s%> over her young יְרַחֵ֑ף <S%H7363><s%> fluttereth יִפְרֹ֤שׂ <S%H6566><s%> spreadeth abroad כְּנָפָיו֙ <S%H3671><s%> her wings יִקָּחֵ֔הוּ <S%H3947><s%> taketh יִשָּׂאֵ֖הוּ <S%H5375><s%> them beareth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over אֶבְרָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H84><s%> them on her wings

יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> [So] the LORD בָּדָ֣ד <S%H910><s%> alone יַנְחֶ֑נּוּ <S%H5148><s%> did lead וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> and there עִמּ֖וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with אֵ֥ל <S%H410><s%> god נֵכָֽר׃ <S%H5236><s%> him and [there was] no strange

יַרְכִּבֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H7392><s%> He made him ride עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and [בָּמֹותֵי כ] (בָּ֣מֳתֵי <S%H1116><s%> height ק) אָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth וַיֹּאכַ֖ל <S%H398><s%> that he might eat תְּנוּבֹ֣ת <S%H8570><s%> the increase שָׂדָ֑י <S%H7704><s%> of the fields וַיֵּנִקֵ֤הֽוּ <S%H3243><s%> and he made him to suck דְבַשׁ֙ <S%H1706><s%> honey מִסֶּ֔לַע <S%H5553><s%> out of the rock וְשֶׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> and oil מֵחַלְמִ֥ישׁ <S%H2496><s%> out of the flinty צֽוּר׃ <S%H6697><s%> rock

חֶמְאַ֨ת <S%H2529><s%> Butter בָּקָ֜ר <S%H1241><s%> of kine וַחֲלֵ֣ב <S%H2461><s%> and milk צֹ֗אן <S%H6629><s%> of sheep עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> With חֵ֨לֶב <S%H2459><s%> with fat כָּרִ֜ים <S%H3733><s%> of lambs וְאֵילִ֤ים <S%H352><s%> and rams בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the breed בָשָׁן֙ <S%H1316><s%> of Bashan וְעַתּוּדִ֔ים <S%H6260><s%> and goats עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> With חֵ֖לֶב <S%H2459><s%> with the fat כִּלְי֣וֹת <S%H3629><s%> of kidneys חִטָּ֑ה <S%H2406><s%> of wheat וְדַם־ <S%H1818><s%> blood עֵנָ֖ב <S%H6025><s%> of the grape תִּשְׁתֶּה־ <S%H8354><s%> and thou didst drink חָֽמֶר׃ <S%H2561><s%> the pure

וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ן <S%H8080><s%> waxed fat יְשֻׁרוּן֙ <S%H3484><s%> But Jeshurun וַיִּבְעָ֔ט <S%H1163><s%> and kicked שָׁמַ֖נְתָּ <S%H8080><s%> thou art waxen fat עָבִ֣יתָ <S%H5666><s%> thou art grown thick כָּשִׂ֑יתָ <S%H3780><s%> thou art covered וַיִּטֹּשׁ֙ <S%H5203><s%> [with fatness] then he forsook אֱל֣וֹהַ <S%H433><s%> God עָשָׂ֔הוּ <S%H6213><s%> [which] made וַיְנַבֵּ֖ל <S%H5034><s%> him and lightly esteemed צ֥וּר <S%H6697><s%> the Rock יְשֻׁעָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H3444><s%> of his salvation

יַקְנִאֻ֖הוּ <S%H7065><s%> They provoked him to jealousy בְּזָרִ֑ים <S%H2114><s%> with strange בְּתוֹעֵבֹ֖ת <S%H8441><s%> [gods] with abominations יַכְעִיסֻֽהוּ׃ <S%H3707><s%> provoked they him to anger

יִזְבְּח֗וּ <S%H2076><s%> They sacrificed לַשֵּׁדִים֙ <S%H7700><s%> unto devils לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> were not אֱלֹ֔הַ <S%H433><s%> not to God אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> to gods לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> have not יְדָע֑וּם <S%H3045><s%> whom they knew חֲדָשִׁים֙ <S%H2319><s%> not to new מִקָּרֹ֣ב <S%H7138><s%> newly בָּ֔אוּ <S%H935><s%> up לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not שְׂעָר֖וּם <S%H8175><s%> feared אֲבֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> whom your fathers

צ֥וּר <S%H6697><s%> Of the Rock יְלָדְךָ֖ <S%H3205><s%> [that] begat תֶּ֑שִׁי <S%H7876><s%> thee thou art unmindful וַתִּשְׁכַּ֖ח <S%H7911><s%> and hast forgotten אֵ֥ל <S%H410><s%> God מְחֹלְלֶֽךָ׃ <S%H2342><s%> that formed

וַיַּ֥רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And when the LORD וַיִּנְאָ֑ץ <S%H5006><s%> [it] he abhorred מִכַּ֥עַס <S%H3708><s%> [them] because of the provoking בָּנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> of his sons וּבְנֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H1323><s%> and of his daughters

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אַסְתִּ֤ירָה <S%H5641><s%> I will hide פָנַי֙ <S%H6440><s%> my face מֵהֶ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> like אֶרְאֶ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> from them I will see מָ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> what אַחֲרִיתָ֑ם <S%H319><s%> what their end כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for ד֤וֹר <S%H1755><s%> generation תַּהְפֻּכֹת֙ <S%H8419><s%> [shall be] for they [are] a very froward הֵ֔מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> children לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> is no אֵמֻ֥ן <S%H529><s%> in whom [is] no faith בָּֽם׃

הֵ֚ם <S%H1992><s%> They קִנְא֣וּנִי <S%H7065><s%> They have moved me to jealousy בְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> with [that which is] not אֵ֔ל <S%H410><s%> God כִּעֲס֖וּנִי <S%H3707><s%> they have provoked me to anger בְּהַבְלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H1892><s%> with their vanities וַאֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> Me אַקְנִיאֵ֣ם <S%H7065><s%> and I will move them to jealousy בְּלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> are not עָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> with [those which are] not a people בְּג֥וֹי <S%H1471><s%> nation נָבָ֖ל <S%H5036><s%> with a foolish אַכְעִיסֵֽם׃ <S%H3707><s%> I will provoke them to anger

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> For אֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> For a fire קָדְחָ֣ה <S%H6919><s%> is kindled בְאַפִּ֔י <S%H639><s%> in mine anger וַתִּיקַ֖ד <S%H3344><s%> and shall burn עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against שְׁא֣וֹל <S%H7585><s%> hell תַּחְתִּ֑ית <S%H8482><s%> unto the lowest וַתֹּ֤אכַל <S%H398><s%> and shall consume אֶ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> the earth וִֽיבֻלָ֔הּ <S%H2981><s%> with her increase וַתְּלַהֵ֖ט <S%H3857><s%> and set on fire מוֹסְדֵ֥י <S%H4146><s%> foundation הָרִֽים׃ <S%H2022><s%> of the mountains
אַסְפֶּ֥ה <S%H5595><s%> I will heap עָלֵ֖ימוֹ <S%H5921><s%> and רָע֑וֹת <S%H7451><s%> mischiefs חִצַּ֖י <S%H2671><s%> mine arrows אֲכַלֶּה־ <S%H3615><s%> upon them I will spend בָּֽם׃

מְזֵ֥י <S%H4198><s%> [They shall be] burnt רָעָ֛ב <S%H7458><s%> with hunger וּלְחֻ֥מֵי <S%H3898><s%> and devoured רֶ֖שֶׁף <S%H7565><s%> with burning heat וְקֶ֣טֶב <S%H6986><s%> destruction מְרִירִ֑י <S%H4815><s%> and with bitter וְשֶׁן־ <S%H8127><s%> the teeth בְּהֵמוֹת֙ <S%H929><s%> of beasts אֲשַׁלַּח־ <S%H7971><s%> I will also send בָּ֔ם עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> With חֲמַ֖ת <S%H2534><s%> upon them with the poison זֹחֲלֵ֥י <S%H2119><s%> of serpents עָפָֽר׃ <S%H6083><s%> of the dust

מִחוּץ֙ <S%H2351><s%> without תְּשַׁכֶּל־ <S%H7921><s%> shall destroy חֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> The sword וּמֵחֲדָרִ֖ים <S%H2315><s%> within אֵימָ֑ה <S%H367><s%> and terror גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> again בָּחוּר֙ <S%H970><s%> both the young man גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> again בְּתוּלָ֔ה <S%H1330><s%> and the virgin יוֹנֵ֖ק <S%H3243><s%> the suckling עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> [also] with the man שֵׂיבָֽה׃ <S%H7872><s%> of gray hairs

אָמַ֖רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> I said אַפְאֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6284><s%> I would scatter them into corners אַשְׁבִּ֥יתָה <S%H7673><s%> of them to cease מֵאֱנ֖וֹשׁ <S%H582><s%> from among men זִכְרָֽם׃ <S%H2143><s%> I would make the remembrance

לוּלֵ֗י <S%H3884><s%> Were it not כַּ֤עַס <S%H3708><s%> the wrath אוֹיֵב֙ <S%H341><s%> of the enemy אָג֔וּר <S%H1481><s%> that I feared פֶּֽן־ <S%H6435><s%> lest יְנַכְּר֖וּ <S%H5234><s%> should behave themselves strangely צָרֵ֑ימוֹ <S%H6862><s%> lest their adversaries פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> would יֹֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> [and] lest they should say יָדֵ֣ינוּ <S%H3027><s%> Our hand רָ֔מָה <S%H7311><s%> [is] high וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD פָּעַ֥ל <S%H6466><s%> hath not done כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all זֹֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> likewise

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> are a ג֛וֹי <S%H1471><s%> For they [are] a nation אֹבַ֥ד <S%H6><s%> void עֵצ֖וֹת <S%H6098><s%> of counsel הֵ֑מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> and there בָּהֶ֖ם תְּבוּנָֽה׃ <S%H8394><s%> neither [is there any] understanding

ל֥וּ <S%H3863><s%> O that חָכְמ֖וּ <S%H2449><s%> they were wise יַשְׂכִּ֣ילוּ <S%H7919><s%> [that] they understood זֹ֑את <S%H2063><s%> would יָבִ֖ינוּ <S%H995><s%> this [that] they would consider לְאַחֲרִיתָֽם׃ <S%H319><s%> their latter end
